sections.text: The Yale School of Public Health MPH prepares students to improve population health through training in epidemiology, biostatistics, policy, and practice.

items: Departmental concentrations (e.g., Epidemiology of Microbial Diseases; Health Policy)
sections.text: The two‑year program combines foundational coursework, a department‑specific concentration, an applied practice experience, and a culminating capstone or thesis.
